account.depositDisabled: Cannot deposit to a non-active account.
account.loanDisabled: Cannot issue loan to a non-active account
account.transferHelpText: Leave blank if you do not wish to set a Transfer daily limit.
account.withdrawDisabled: Cannot withdraw from a non-active account.
account.withdrawalHelpText: Leave blank if you do not wish to set a Withdrawal daily limit.

commonText.customerChangePostCode: Contact a bank administrator to change your address.
commonText.validPhoneNumber: 'Allowed inputs +, 0-9. Must be at least {{minPhoneNumberLength}} digits.
commonText.validPostCode: The Post code entered must be a minimum of {{minPostCodeLength}} digits.

error.approveOverdraft: Failed to approve the overdraft. Error: {{error}}
error.assignRole: Failed to assign role to user.
error.createCustomerError: Failed to create the customer. Error: {{error}}
error.currentAccount: Failed to create current account. Error: {{error}}
error.duplicateFile: {{fileName}} is a duplicate file. It will be removed from the upload.
error.failedToUpdateCustomer: Failed to update customer information. Error: {{error}}
error.fetchingData: Error occured while fetching data. Please reload the page to try again.
error.fileSize: Your file exceeds the maximum file limit of {{maxSize}} bytes.
error.insufficientBalance: This account has insufficient funds to complete this transaction, please check the balance and try again.
error.invalidValue: Invalid value entered, please try again or contact an administrator.
error.issueLoanTooLow: Loan amount must be greater than 0.
error.issueLoanOverdraft: Cannot issue loan as account is currently in deficit, possibly in overdraft.
error.login: Invalid credentials. Please try again or contact an administrator.
error.noCurrentAccounts: You have no active current accounts to make payments from.
error.registerSameCustId: A customer with the ID {{custId}} already exists. Try to register with a different ID.
error.registerSameUsername: A customer with the user name {{username}} already exists. Please select a different user name.
error.revokeRole: Failed to revoke role for user. Error: {{error}}
error.savingsAccount: Failed To Create Savings Account. Error: {{error}}
error.sameAccountsError: From and To accounts must be different.
error.setStatus: Failed to set the status. Error: {{error}}
error.serverContactError: Failed to get data from server. Error: {{error}}
error.startDateCannotBePast: Start date cannot be in the past. Please set a new start date.
error.tokenMismatch: The currency type submitted does not match the account currency type.
error.transferLimitExceeded: This transfer exceeds the transfer daily limit. Try a lower amount or set a new limit.
error.withdrawalLimitExceeded: This withdrawal exceeds the withdrawal daily limit. Try a lower amount or set a new limit.

guest.guestMessage: Your account {{custMsg}} {{accountId}} is currently under review by an administrator.

inputHelpText.registerFile: Customer document (Customer Only, Corda Attachment Upload).
inputHelpText.tableSearch: Search by any table key (minimum 3 characters, case sensitive).

inputHelpText.userSearch: Search for users by username or email.

payments.selectFromAccount: Select from your active, current accounts.
payments.selectToAccount: Select from your active, transferable accounts, or manually enter below.

socketNotification.accountCreated: New account with account ID {{accountId}} created! Go to the Accounts page to view the new account.
socketNotification.propertyChanged: {{propertyName}} changed for account with ID: {{accountId}}. New {{propertyName}} is now {{propertyValue}}.
socketNotification.realtimeServiceConnected: You are now connected to Corda's vault update realtime notification service!

success.approvedOverDraft: Successfully approved overdraft for this account.
success.issueLoan: Successfully issued loan for this account.
success.registered: Successfully registered. You can now log in.

warning.noTransactions: No transactions found for this account.
warning.selectCustomerWithCurrentAccount: Please select a customer with a current account.
warning.noRecurringPayments: No recurring payments found for this account.
warning.revokingAdmin: In case of revoking: Ensure there is at least one admin left on the system.
